title: [GAMEPLAY] Tier Icons Wrong for Cloud 9
body:
I have a Tier 3 Cloud 9 Icon and when I flash it in game it is what the Tier 1 Icon is supposed to be. Tier 2 Icon flashes the Tier 3 emblem, Tier 1 flashes Tier 2. 
Tier 3 Icon makes you flash tier 1.
Tier 2 -> Tier 3
Tier 1 -> Tier 2
Tier 2:
https://gyazo.com/8a0aeb3660a5f136926cd3a225056746
Tier 3: (The Logo is on the ground)
https://gyazo.com/fff5700c09a7d8a837670cf4dc90b868

replies.body: same, spent money to get a worse emote :D
I am also having this same issue with the C9 icon. I made a post as well under the game play forums.
Hey, we're aware of the issue and working to get it resolved. Thank you for the bug report!
Cool I thought it was just me. Except my Tier 3 is Gold instead of platinum for some reason
